wikitext.*:
'''''thurin''''' is an adjective meaning "secret" or "hidden" in [[Sindarin]].<ref>{{LR|Etymologies}}, entry "THUR"</ref> It was used as a proper name for [[Túrin]] by [[Finduilas]], who doubted that his true name was ''Agarwaen''. The similarity with his name disturbed him greatly.<ref>{{CH|10}}, p. 165</ref>

==Examples==
* ''[[Thuringwethil|'''Thurin'''gwethil]]'' = "Secret Shadow"
* ''[[Garthúrian|Gar'''thúrian''']]'' = "Hidden Realm"
